data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Murakami, Hiroyuki, Yamasako, Junsuke, Chou, Wen-I, Yang, Ganyan (2013): Review of the genus Allochotes (Coleoptera: Cleridae: Neorthopleurinae) from Taiwan. Zootaxa 3710 (6): 565-577, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3710.6.3
